BODY.LINE1: Here you can remove your saved PIN from the website.
BODY.LINE2: A re-entry will be required when renting the next bike.

map.NO_BIKES: No rentable bikes at this station right now.

PIN.CTA: Enter your PIN to rent a bike. You will only have to do this once.

BOOKING.SWITCH: Switch current booking to this station

RENT.SLIDE_FOR_BIKE_NO1: Slide to rent bike at slot

sw.UPDATE_AVAILABLE: There is an update available. Please close and reopen all open Velocity browser tabs to apply it.

LOAD_FAILED.TITLE: Error while loading page
LOAD_FAILED.BODY: An error occured while loading the page. Please close all opened Velocity tabs and reopen the website.
